metadata.name: Fire Behind
metadata.description:
I dreamt I lived in a cabin by the sea.  
Its walls were small, but I survived  
by making the beach my home.  
  
---  
  
**Artist:**  Steve Walasavage  
**Series:**  Non-Fungible Travels  
**Collection:**  Dreaming California  
**Edition:**  1/1 NFT  
  
---  
  
About *Dreaming California*:  Many years ago, shortly after I finished college, I packed up everything I owned and drove across the country from Boston to San Diego.  I had no job lined up, few friends there, and fewer plans.  Somehow though, I made my way, and had countless amazing experiences in the process!  I lived there by the beach for exactly one year, and it was one of the most formative and monumental years of my life.  However, I had no fancy camera back then, so my memories are fading, becoming more abstract and dreamlike with each passing year...  
  
In the time since I lived in southern California, I've returned many times.  I've explored natural and man-made beauty all over this state, and thankfully I've captured bits and pieces of it with each trip.  *Dreaming California* is a set of images I've put together that conveys my own dream-like memories of my first year there, as well as my subsequent visits since.  I hope you enjoy these depictions of the Golden State as much as I enjoyed crafting them!  
  
Each NFT in this collection is a 1/1 edition.  
  
---  
  
Extended Editorial License:  Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants.  The License includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder.  Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works.
